questions.question_text: Publishing an item to the Service Catalog can be done by using the “Publish to Hardware Catalog” related link in:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Definitely A - spent some time on this. The UI Action 'Create hardware assets prior to delivery' points to the Script Include 'ProcurementUtils' which is definitely setting this to '2' or 'On Order'.

questions.question_text: An asset is manually created from a purchase order before it has been shipped by the supplier. By default, the state of the asset is set to:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
С from NowLearning
The results in all the tabs in the Hardware Asset dashboard are updated in real-time, with the exception of the reports that display data in the Lifecycle Overview sections, which are updated daily based on scheduled jobs.

Selected Answer: C
The results in all the tabs in the Hardware Asset dashboard are updated in real-time,
with the exception of the reports that display data in the Lifecycle Overview sections
which are updated daily based on scheduled jobs.

questions.question_text: How often are the tabs in the Hardware Asset dashboard updated?
What minimum role is required in order to use the Hardware Asset dashboard?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Page 317 Vancouver text

Selected Answer: A
Asset is the answer

choices.B: Hardware models up for end of life
choices.A: New hardware assets found by audits

discussion.content:
A - View transfer orders and audit information—are there open audits and/or new assets found from an audit (e.g., are you finding a lot of assets that you didn't previously know about, are they in a particular class, or a particular location, do you need to investigate why those assets aren’t in your database?)
D - View Open Stock Orders and Active Stock Rules by class (e.g., if you aren’t managing stock for network gear, why not?) 

E - Same explanation as A

comments.content: Also - View the number of Loaner Asset Orders that are new, deployed, and/or are overdue for return and View a list of all open RMA request lines

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ADE
ADE 
View transfer orders and audit information—are there open audits and/or new assets found from an audit (e.g., are you finding a lot of assets that you didn't previously know about, are they in a particular class, or a particular location, do you need to investigate why those assets aren’t in your database?)

Selected Answer: ADE
Answer is ADE
